title: Straight Flush Plumbing

<map name="1811747" theme="prism" version="tango"><topic central="true" text="Straight Flush Plumbing" id="1"><topic position="366,-50" order="0" id="2"><text><![CDATA[• Address: Unit 1/7 Glover Street Ngauranga Wellington 6035 New Zealand
• Phone: 04 973 5874
• Website: http://www.straightflush.co.nz/

Straight Flush Plumbing Limited is a full-service
plumbing, gasfitting, drainlaying, and roofing company
operating largely in Wellington, New Zealand, with
services including Lower Hutt and Porirua. They offer
a series of services from maintenance to completely
handled renovations and commercial setups.
]]></text></topic></topic></map>
